snippet: In a nonbinding vote that will be presented to the board of trustees next year, faculty members decided unanimously that Lord Jeff should no longer serve as the school’s unofficial mascot.
abstract: Faculty of Amherst College votes to remove Lord Jeffery Amherst as school's unofficial mascot; Amherst, who deliberately gave smallpox-infected blankets to Native Americans in 18th century, was target of demands by Amherst students rallying against racism on campus in recent days.
lead_paragraph: In a nonbinding vote that will be presented to the board of trustees next year, faculty members decided unanimously that Lord Jeff should no longer serve as the school’s unofficial mascot.

headline.main: Amherst Mascot Gets Thumbs Down From Faculty
headline.print_headline: Mascot Gets Thumbs Down From Faculty at Amherst
